attributes.description: Vehicle comes with balance of the 4yr / 120 000km factory warranty. NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.

All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.
